summary:
A designer. 
My design toolbox is comprised of Digital Design, Service Design, Design Strategy, and enhanced by my interest for Economics, Cognitive Science, Blockchain, Music, Mathematics, Biology, Neuro Science, and all things nerdy and wondrous about our human abilities.

school.name: Faculdade de Belas Artes - Universidade de Lisboa

projects.title: Philips | TASY
projects.description:
Projeto HTML5 - solução para a gestão de organizações de saúde públicas e privadas (hospital, clínica, banco de sangue, home care entre outros). Gerenciamento das atividades administrativas, financeiras, assistenciais e operacionais.

Philips TASY is an integrated hospital information management system.

contributors.headline: Head of Innovation & Design | Customer experience manager at Itaú Unibanco
Design Manager at Localiza&Co and Teacher at PUC Minas

projects.title: Little Magic Apprentices: The Art of Learning the new sorcery that is Technology
projects.description:
Continuation of the Puppets Duet in [E]ngaging Major, Op. 33. Aimed at studying children’s understanding and interpretation of technology through a particular game in which interactive sock-puppets present a way for kids to explore the virtual world of a game, it’s rules, and consequently gain “magical powers” that can be transposed to their “real-world” games.
Studies set out in three diferent parts of the world: Nepal, Madeira and England

contributors.headline: User Experience  Researcher, Designer, Instructor, Catalyst

projects.title: Visualizing EEG data + EyeGaze Interaction
projects.description: Understanding the process of designing a data visualization composition, based on data collected from electrical activity along the scalp, eye-tracking data and other secondary data like altitude, GPS positioning and acceleration along the typical Wicker Toboggan Sled Ride. Study on how possible representations might prompt the discovery of patterns and how it might data visualization might help in cases – such as this one – where data cannot simply be combined and analyzed in a typical statistical manner.

contributors.headline: Head of IT at Porto Bay Hotels & Resorts

projects.title: GMESha & GreenHicker
projects.description: The project was integrated in the GMES Masters Design Competition for Innovative Earth Monitoring Services where participants were to submit design concept. The proposed system would incorporate in situ human activity data and earth monitoring data to provide a framework for analyzing interaction between human activities and the environment.

projects.title: Service Design: Emergency Response
projects.description:
• Extracted info from emergency websites, interviewed 8 victims to identify user needs.
• Mapped service touch points, enacted user experiences, and reiterated design.

projects.title: Evaluating Mobile Applications in a Virtual Environment - A comparison with Field Studies for IJMHCI Special Issue
projects.description: Comparative user study of a mobile application called FlyTalk in both field and virtual environment (the Cave). Aimed at understanding to which extent virtual environments may serve as an optimal trade-off between running laboratory and field-studies in the detection of usability problems.

profile_positions.title: Senior Experience Lead

profile_positions.description:
Radiology Solutions UX Harmonization Strategy
• Defined the strategy by with a business with a set of 20 different digital applications should go about delivering a seamless user experiences for a set of 16 users. (3 months)
• Strategy became a model for Philips' current Design Language System (tools, methodologies created during this work are still in use till this day)

PerformanceBridge 
• Developed a way-of-working for the collaboration between Design and Development team
• Created a set of assets and documentation that enabled our Design team to become 75% more efficient in our creation, prototyping and specification stages
• Co-lead a team of 5 towards delivering a high-fidelity prototype for the RSNA 2017
• Lead the design of a web app for radiology and technicians to manage radiology protocols
• Co-designed the research methodology for field studies (which I also participated in and lead several field studies)
profile_positions.title: User Experience Designer

profile_positions.description: Introductory class on User Centered Design to students of Digital Entrepreneurship.

profile_positions.description:
Watedo is a local market place of experiences, a platform that allows for local enthusiasts to share experiences, tips, and knowledge to the intrepid explorers that can not wait to enjoy their vacations in a new, genuine and meaningful manner.

Watedo was a participant at Venture Labs - Stanford University (USA).
More details in due time
profile_positions.title: Co-founder

company.name: Novabase - Collab | Carnegie Mellon University - Universidade da Madeira

profile_positions.description: Researched on the ways businesses currently present themselves in social media and on the behavior of the consumers they are trying to attract, both in social media and outside. Designed and prototyped an interface solution within Facebook that was both a tool to support purchasing decision making for users and an advertising space where businesses could showcase their brands and products and have an active role in helping consumers make their decisions if so they wished, as well as tailoring general business strategies based on activity received from the user.
profile_positions.title: Social Media Beyond Trending Topics

company.name: Carnegie Mellon University - Universidade da Madeira

profile_positions.company: Carnegie Mellon University - Universidade da Madeira
profile_positions.description: Researched about people’s needs and experiences in undergoing and helping in a large scale disaster. Designed a service concept that catered to people’s information and communication needs that allowed them to prepare, overcome and help/contribute in an emergency situation.
profile_positions.title: YouFirst_Emergency Service

profile_positions.company: Carnegie Mellon University - Universidade da Madeira
profile_positions.description: Designed a mobile app that would use a store’s inventory to alert the consumer about an existing product, thus providing the user with a tool that enables product location as well as general feature comparison across the same products within a determined location.
profile_positions.title: ShopPing!

profile_positions.description:
Team of five researched on current team approaches to remote and long term collaboration and came up with a solution that addressed synchronous creation of artifacts, prompting teams and team members to interact and work together more often in a smaller and more significant teams, with the adequate tools to do so.

Other project experiences include Designing for Happiness; Exploration of Novel Interactions and Designing an app to support recent empty-nesters in the task of sorting through, organizing and deciding what to do their kid’s things.
profile_positions.title: Remote Collaboration

profile_positions.description: Researched and designed solution proposals for redesign of a breast-cancer early detection robot. Worked as industrial designer within a team of computer system engineers, mechanical engineers and physicists.
profile_positions.title: Scanner Clear PEM

profile_positions.description: Researched and designed proposal for the casing of an active RFID tag to be placed in shipping containers for logistics tool
